metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31613 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer, where any local user can cause a null-pointer dereference, which may lead to a kernel panic.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Windows-specific issue some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
